short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Catch and decode all the JWTs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show, Decode and Copy all the Json Web Tokens.
Are you sending JWT tokens in your HTTP requests? Tired of copying tokens from the developer view into jwt.io when debugging?
It will detect all the HTTP(S) requests with Header and Cookies containing a JWT  and conveniently display the content.
